mapper.sql: id, device_type, config_name, config_code, config_value, default_value, unit, status, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, is_exist, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from nmpl_config
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into nmpl_config (id, device_type, config_name, config_code, config_value, default_value, unit, status, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, is_exist, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{configName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{configCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{configValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isExist,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
